Articles.Content:
Hello Fellow Kerbalnauts,

KSP....what can i say..... Very addictive and educative. Something i was looking for, for a very long time.

Anyway i am also looking for tips and tricks since i am new to the game. Take off goes well, but my problem is....Then what?

It seems i experience problems in setting courses and maneuvers. Maybe you die hards out there are able to give some explanations or locations where i can find some good tutorials?

Kindest regards,

a space nerd

Henkmeister

Welcome aboard!

As a matter of fact, look in my signature. One of the greatest tools on this forum is the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials subforum. You can ask questions there.

I'm not all that good at explaining maneuvers, unfortunately...

Good luck, and welcome to the forums!

Welcome! There are a tonne of great tutorials in the tutorials section of the forum. The first thing you probably want to master is getting into orbit.

After that, the entire system awaits.

Happy landings!
Thank you all for your awnsers. These are just the things i was looking for. Starting to get the hang of it. A big help
